languages.text: {n}Из уголков глаз Идиры начинает сочиться кровь.{/n} "Яд тайны ненайденной точит недра стальные и кровь их. Плоть родная, да разум чужд, таится, выжидает пока добыча уснет. Чего стоит завтрашний день, дитя человека? Пробуди лихо и знай, либо не ведай и утратишь себя". {n}Резко втянув воздух, ведьма приходит в себя и косится на вас:{/n} "Подумайте хорошенько, Лорд-капитан, как бы последняя ниточка сейчас из наших рук не выскользнула. А судя по тому, что голосочки шепчут — без обряда быть беде".

{n}Blood begins to seep out of the corners of Idira's eyes.{/n} "The poison of the undiscovered mystery is eating away at the steel insides and the lifeblood that courses within them. Within kindred flesh lurks a strange mind, waiting for its prey to fall asleep. What is tomorrow worth, O child of Humanity? Rouse the slumbering trouble and find out, or else carry on in ignorance until you lose yourself." {n}As she regains her senses, Idira inhales sharply, then glances sideways at you:{/n} "Do think it over, Lord Captain. We're on the verge of letting the last thread slip from our hands. And if my little voices' whispers are anything to go by, without the ritual, things will get very bad."
languages.original_text: {n}Из уголков глаз Идиры начинает сочиться кровь.{/n} "Яд тайны ненайденной точит недра стальные и кровь их. Плоть родная, да разум чужд, таится, выжидает пока добыча уснет. Чего стоит завтрашний день, дитя человека? Пробуди лихо и знай, либо не ведай и утратишь себя". {n}Резко втянув воздух, ведьма приходит в себя и косится на вас:{/n} "Подумайте хорошенько, Лорд-капитан, как бы последняя ниточка сейчас из наших рук не выскользнула. А судя по тому, что голосочки шепчут — без обряда быть беде".

traits.locale_text: {n}Blood begins to seep out of the corners of Idira's eyes.{/n} "The poison of the undiscovered mystery is eating away at their steely insides and their blood. Within kindred flesh lurks an alien mind, waiting for its prey to fall asleep. What is tomorrow worth, O child of Humanity? Stir sleeping trouble and find out, or else carry on not knowing until you lose yourself." {n}The witch inhales sharply as she regains her senses, then glances sideways at you:{/n} "Do think it over, Lord Captain. We're on the verge of letting the last thread slip out of our hands. And if my little voices' whispers are anything to go by, without the ritual, things will get bad."

languages.text: {n}イディラの目から血がじわりとにじみ出す。{/n}「見いだされぬ神秘の毒が、鋼の内臓を蝕み、その中を巡る命の血をも喰らっている。同胞の肉の内には、奇怪なる思念が潜み、獲物が眠りに落ちるのを待ち受けている。人類の子よ、明日にはいかなる価値があるのか？眠れる災いを呼び覚まし、確かめよ。さもなくば、無知のまま歩みを続け、己を失うがいい」{n}やがて正気を取り戻したイディラは、鋭く息を吸い込み、横目であなたを見やる。{/n}「よくお考えくださいませ、ロードキャプテン。最後の糸を手放す瀬戸際にございます。小さき声が囁くところによれば、儀式を行わないと事態は極めて悪しきものとなります」
languages.original_text: {n}Blood begins to seep out of the corners of Idira's eyes.{/n} "The poison of the undiscovered mystery is eating away at the steel insides and the lifeblood that courses within them. Within kindred flesh lurks a strange mind, waiting for its prey to fall asleep. What is tomorrow worth, O child of Humanity? Rouse the slumbering trouble and find out, or else carry on in ignorance until you lose yourself." {n}As she regains her senses, Idira inhales sharply, then glances sideways at you:{/n} "Do think it over, Lord Captain. We're on the verge of letting the last thread slip from our hands. And if my little voices' whispers are anything to go by, without the ritual, things will get very bad."

languages.text: {n}De los ojos de Idira empieza a brotar sangre.{/n} «El veneno de un misterio por descubrir corroe las vísceras de acero y la sangre que fluye por ellas. En la carne afín acecha una mente extraña, esperando a que su presa duerma. ¿Qué vale el mañana, descendiente de la Humanidad? Despierta el problema de su letargo y descúbrelo, o sigue en tu ignorancia hasta que te pierdas». {n}Cuando recupera el sentido, Idira da un respingo y te mira de reojo:{/n} «Piénselo, Lord Capitán. Estamos a punto de dejar que el último hilo se nos escape. Y, si los susurros de mis vocecitas están en lo cierto, sin el ritual la cosa empeorará mucho».
languages.original_text: {n}Blood begins to seep out of the corners of Idira's eyes.{/n} "The poison of the undiscovered mystery is eating away at the steel insides and the lifeblood that courses within them. Within kindred flesh lurks a strange mind, waiting for its prey to fall asleep. What is tomorrow worth, O child of Humanity? Rouse the slumbering trouble and find out, or else carry on in ignorance until you lose yourself." {n}As she regains her senses, Idira inhales sharply, then glances sideways at you:{/n} "Do think it over, Lord Captain. We're on the verge of letting the last thread slip from our hands. And if my little voices' whispers are anything to go by, without the ritual, things will get very bad."

En la carne afín acecha una mente extraña, esperando a que su presa duerma. ¿Qué vale el mañana, descendiente de la Humanidad? Despierta el problema de su letargo y descúbrelo, o sigue en tu ignorancia hasta que te pierdas». {n}Cuando recupera el sentido, Idira da un respingo y te mira de reojo:{/n} «Piénselo, Lord Capitán. Estamos a punto de dejar que el último hilo se nos escape. Y, si los susurros de mis vocecitas están en lo cierto, sin el ritual la cosa empeorará mucho».

languages.text: {n}Du sang commence à couler au coin des yeux d'Idira.{/n} « Le poison du mystère ronge les entrailles d'acier et l'énergie vitale qui les anime. Un esprit étrange guette dans la même chair, attendant que sa proie s'endorme. Quelle valeur peut bien avoir l'avenir, ô enfant de l'humanité ? Réveille le mal endormi pour le découvrir, ou continue dans l'ignorance jusqu'à te perdre toi-même. » {n}Retrouvant ses esprits, Idira prend une brusque inspiration avant de vous lancer un regard en coin :{/n} « Réfléchissez bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous sommes sur le point de laisser échapper le dernier fil qu'il nous restait. Et à en croire les murmures de mes petites voix, sans le rituel, nous courons un grand danger. »
languages.original_text: {n}Blood begins to seep out of the corners of Idira's eyes.{/n} "The poison of the undiscovered mystery is eating away at the steel insides and the lifeblood that courses within them. Within kindred flesh lurks a strange mind, waiting for its prey to fall asleep. What is tomorrow worth, O child of Humanity? Rouse the slumbering trouble and find out, or else carry on in ignorance until you lose yourself." {n}As she regains her senses, Idira inhales sharply, then glances sideways at you:{/n} "Do think it over, Lord Captain. We're on the verge of letting the last thread slip from our hands. And if my little voices' whispers are anything to go by, without the ritual, things will get very bad."

Nous sommes sur le point de laisser échapper le dernier fil qu'il nous restait. Et à en croire les murmures de mes petites voix, sans le rituel, nous courons un grand danger. »

languages.text: {n}鲜血从伊迪拉的眼角渗了出来。{/n}“尚未揭晓的神秘毒液，侵蚀着钢铁的内脏，毒害着流动的血液。在同族的躯壳之中，潜伏着某个陌生的意识，等待着它的猎物安眠。噢，人类的子嗣啊，明天有何价值？唤醒潜藏的灾难，找到祸根，或在无知中沉沦，迷失自我。”{n}她恢复意识之后，猛地吸了一大口气，瞟了你一眼。{/n}“还是仔细考虑考虑吧，舰长大人，最后的线索马上就要从我们手中溜走了。如果那些耳语说的都是真的，那我们必须举行这场仪式，否则事态会变得相当糟糕。”
languages.original_text: {n}Blood begins to seep out of the corners of Idira's eyes.{/n} "The poison of the undiscovered mystery is eating away at the steel insides and the lifeblood that courses within them. Within kindred flesh lurks a strange mind, waiting for its prey to fall asleep. What is tomorrow worth, O child of Humanity? Rouse the slumbering trouble and find out, or else carry on in ignorance until you lose yourself." {n}As she regains her senses, Idira inhales sharply, then glances sideways at you:{/n} "Do think it over, Lord Captain. We're on the verge of letting the last thread slip from our hands. And if my little voices' whispers are anything to go by, without the ritual, things will get very bad."

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Mal sickert Blut aus Idiras Augenwinkeln.{/n} "Das Gift des unentdeckten Mysteriums zerfrisst den Stahl im Inneren und den Lebenssaft, der in ihnen pulsiert. In blutsverwandtem Fleisch lauert ein seltsamer Verstand, der darauf wartet, dass seine Beute einschläft. Was ist das Morgen wert, oh, Kind der Menschheit? Wecke den schlummernden Ärger und finde es heraus, oder hülle dich weiter in Ignoranz, bis du dich selbst verlierst." {n}Als sie wieder zu sich kommt, atmet Idira scharf ein und wirft dir einen Seitenblick zu.{/n} "Überlegt es Euch noch einmal, Lord Captain. Nicht mehr lange und der letzte Faden entgleitet Euren Händen. Und sollten meine Flüsterstimmen eine Bedeutung haben, werden die Dinge ohne das Ritual sehr schlimm."
languages.original_text: {n}Blood begins to seep out of the corners of Idira's eyes.{/n} "The poison of the undiscovered mystery is eating away at the steel insides and the lifeblood that courses within them. Within kindred flesh lurks a strange mind, waiting for its prey to fall asleep. What is tomorrow worth, O child of Humanity? Rouse the slumbering trouble and find out, or else carry on in ignorance until you lose yourself." {n}As she regains her senses, Idira inhales sharply, then glances sideways at you:{/n} "Do think it over, Lord Captain. We're on the verge of letting the last thread slip from our hands. And if my little voices' whispers are anything to go by, without the ritual, things will get very bad."

Wecke den schlummernden Ärger und finde es heraus, oder hülle dich weiter in Ignoranz, bis du dich selbst verlierst." {n}Als sie wieder zu sich kommt, atmet Idira scharf ein und wirft dir einen Seitenblick zu.{/n} "Überlegt es Euch noch einmal, Lord Captain. Nicht mehr lange und der letzte Faden entgleitet Euren Händen. Und sollten meine Flüsterstimmen eine Bedeutung haben, werden die Dinge ohne das Ritual sehr schlimm."

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın göz pınarlarından kan sızmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Keşfedilmemiş sırrın zehri, çelikten iç organları ve o organlarda akan hayat kanını kemiriyor. Aşina bir tende yabancı bir zihin gizleniyor, avının uykuya dalmasını kolluyor. Yarının ne kıymeti var ki ey İnsanlığın evladı? Uykudaki felaketi uyandır da gör... Aksi durumda kendini yitirene dek cehalet uykusunda kal." {n}Kendine gelen İdira, derin bir nefes çekip sonrasında yan bir bakışla sana dönüyor.{/n} "İyice düşün Lord Kaptan. Son umut kırıntımızı da kaybetmek üzereyiz. Eğer minik seslerimin fısıltıları doğruysa bu ayini yapmazsak başımız fena hâlde belaya girecek."

We're on the verge of letting the last thread slip from our hands. And if my little voices' whispers are anything to go by, without the ritual, things will get very bad."
